import "./AboutContentStyles.css"; import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaPython, FaJsSquare, FaPhp, FaHtml5, FaCss3Alt, FaWordpress,FaRobot, FaBullhorn } from 'react-icons/fa'; const AboutContent = () => { return (

Who Am I?

< div className="bio-text">

I am a Multidisciplinary Technologist with expertise in web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React), backend development (Python, Flask), database management (PHP and SQL) and advanced technologies (Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence).

Skills

Python

JavaScript

PHP

HTML

CSS

WordPress

Machine Learning

Digital Marketing

Additional Information

This is some additional information that spans the full width of the container.

) } export default AboutContent;
